description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. On fol. 1a: "Jild-i khāmis" and "Jild-i z̲akhīrah ... sharīf ..." Physical description: 25 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on tan glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords; a few marginal notes. Light staining and smudging; a few paper repairs. In excellent condition. Origin: Copy completed on 2 Shawwāl 968 H [16 June 1561] by Aḥmad ibn Rafīʻ al-Ṭarafī (fol. 233a). Incipit: كتاب العتق هو لغة الخلوص ومنه سمي البيت الشريف عتيقا والخيل الجياد عتاقا وشرعا خلوص المملوك الآدمي او بعضه من الرق بالنسبة الى مطلق العتق
author: Shahīd al-Thānī, Zayn al-Dīn ibn ʻAlī, 1506-1559
abstract: Volume five of al-Shahīd al-Thānī's commentary on Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām, a well-known work on Shiite fiqh. Contains kitāb al-ʻitq - kitāb al-luqṭah; list of contents on fol. 1a.
extent: 233 leaves : paper ; 254 x 190 (175 x 117) mm. bound to 256 x 195 mm.

title.@value: [Volume 5 of Masālik al-afhām fī sharḥ Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām].

uniform_title: Masālik al-afhām fī sharḥ Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām. Jild 5
مسالك الافهام في شرح شرائع الاسلام. جلد 5
provenance: Effaced owner's stamps on fol. 1a, 1b, 233a; effaced note on fol. 1a. Owner's stamp on fol. 1b.
creator: Shahīd al-Thānī, Zayn al-Dīn ibn ʻAlī, 1506-1559
شهيد الثاني، زين الدين بن علي، 1506-1559
subject: Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī, Jaʻfar ibn al-Ḥasan, 1205 or 1206-1277—Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām.
binding_note: Paper over pasted boards with leather spine and edges.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
